headline: George Vincent Named as Kroger Secretary and General Counsel
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced George Vincent will join the company as its secretary and general counsel, effective August 4.

raw.headline: George Vincent Named as Kroger Secretary and General Counsel
raw.summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced George Vincent will join the company as its secretary and general counsel, effective August 4.

headline: Beef Prices Reach Record Highs — And They'll Likely Keep Rising
summary: The cost of ground beef is the highest it's ever been, at $6 a pound, according to the USDA. Meanwhile, the average price of steak is up to over $11 a pound.

raw.headline: Beef Prices Reach Record Highs — And They'll Likely Keep Rising
raw.summary: The cost of ground beef is the highest it's ever been, at $6 a pound, according to the USDA. Meanwhile, the average price of steak is up to over $11 a pound.

headline: Rite Aid closing these 33 New Jersey locations amid bankruptcy
summary: The locations span North, Central and South Jersey, as well as the Jersey Shore, after the chain’s second bankruptcy since 2023.

raw.summary: The locations span North, Central and South Jersey, as well as the Jersey Shore, after the chain’s second bankruptcy since 2023.

headline: Oakmark U.S. Large Value Strategy Q2 2025 Commentary
summary: Oakmark U.S. Large Value Strategy's return was 4.48% (net) for the reporting period vs. Russell 1000 Value Index that returned 3.79% for the same period.

headline: Kroger: Solid Execution And Momentum Justify Current Valuation
